page.title: 12Things to do in Kirkby
page.content: These are many different kinds of entertainment in Kirkby. The sports centre caters for most sports such as football, weightlifting, squash and many others. There was a cinema, but this is now used for bingo. The adults can also go to pubs and clubs. The youngsters attend the many youth clubs in the area such as Centre 63. Here they play table tennis, pool, football and have discos. Some of the schools such as Ruffwood, run clubs for their pupils. These include weightlifting, photography and discos. The very young children attend the cubs, brownies, guides and scouts.
